articles.title: Van Niekerk 'uncomfortable' in cricket kit
articles.description: Former South Africa captain Dane van Niekerk says she feels "uncomfortable" wearing cricket kit after being dropped over fitness issues.
articles.content:
Dane van Niekerk made her competitive return for Sunrisers against South East Stars in May
